Summary: Biochemical reaction from trimipramine to desmethyltrimipramine. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C19 or CYP2C9.
Biochemical reaction from desmethyltrimipramine to 2-hydroxydesmethyltrimipramine. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from trimipramine to 2-hydroxytrimipramine. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
